properties.name: Dan Ryan Accident (1)
properties.description: Posted by Honorwisdom4500 wentworth, chicago, ILFebruary 24, 2008, a motorist (traveling southbound) losted control of their vehicle and crashed into the expressway wall due to an IDOT truck(traveling northbound) plowed snow which landed onto southbound lane. Ten other car accidents occurred on this day due to heavy snow.

properties.name: Dan Ryan Accident (2)
properties.description: Posted by Honorwisdom6300 yale, chicago, ILMarch 3, 2008, a 3 car accident occured due to snow not being plowed. There were no injuries.

properties.name: Dan Ryan Accident (3)
properties.description: Posted by Honorwisdom5500 wentworth, chicago, ILApril 11, 2008 a traffic accident of 1 vehicle resulted in two fatalites and one critically injuried.

properties.name: Dan Ryan Accident (4)
properties.description: Posted by Honorwisdom1800 s. ruble, chicago, ilApril 14, 2008, a one car accident resulted in one fatality on the 18th street ramp.

properties.name: Dan Ryan Accident (5)
properties.description: Posted by Honorwisdom150 w. cermak road, chicago, ilApril 26, 2008 a truck exited off of the Dan Ryan and onto Cermak Road. The trucker drove straigt directly into the CTA train entrance.

properties.name: Northwestern University
properties.description: Posted by Honorwisdom633 Clark Street Evanston, IL 60208For his graduate studies, Hef attended Northwestern University and took some sociology courses with an interest in individual freedom.

properties.name: Playboy Enterprises Inc.
properties.description: Posted by Honorwisdom680 n. Lake Shore Drive, Chicago, IL 60611In December of 1953, Hef pursued his dream of having his own magazine company.

properties.name: Playboy Mansion (Chicago)
properties.description: Posted by Honorwisdom1340 N State Parkway. Chicago, IL 60610After studying so many courses, aplying himself in school, and achieving his goals, Hugh Hefner is livng the life he had dreamed of.

properties.name: Steinmetz High School
properties.description: Posted by Honorwisdom 3030 n. mobile ave., chicago, IL 60634Located on the West side of Chicago, Hugh Hefner graduated from Steinmetz High School which is also known as Steinmetz Academic Centre.

properties.name: The School of the Art Institute of Chicago
properties.description: Posted by Honorwisdom  111 s. michigan ave., chicago, IL 60603Hef enrolled in some art classes at the School of the Art Institute of Chicago in the summer of 1946.

properties.name: University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
properties.description: Posted by Honorwisdom901 w. Ilinois Street, Urbana, IL 61801Hugh Hefner graduated from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign in 2 years by taking more than the average amount of classes per semester. He earned a Bachelor\'s Degree in Journalism.
